review_cvs: ^. Let's size up the crew on paper here before you meet 'em.
cv_pearl: ^"First up we got Pearl — what a beauty she is. Very bubbly."
cv_rory: ^"Then there’s this suspicious guy with no name. Seriously, how do you not fill in your name on a CV?"
cv_shad: ^"Well doesn’t he have quite the body. Shad — big heart, even bigger biceps."
cv_ravynn: ^"Ravynn — quiet, deliberate, and belonged to an enemy ship?? Now that’s a backstory."
cv_end: ^"Well, ain’t they... something. Why don’t you go meet the bunch of mishaps, Cap’n?"
